str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
Apparent, clear, visible, manifest; adv: clearly. From phaino; shining, i.e. Apparent; neuter publicly, externally.
Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.
Hidden away, secret, stored up. From apokrupto; secret; by implication, treasured.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Apparent, clear, visible, manifest; adv: clearly. From phaino; shining, i.e. Apparent; neuter publicly, externally.
